item.title: An eruptive illness called !hamman-xu
item.summary: An illness which scratches and affects the throat which does not cause death.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book VIII-30
item.author: |hanâ‰ kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)

keyword.subkw: an eruptive illness affecting the throat called !hamman-xu
